title: Very good
review: If you didn't see or like the original Blade Runner, you might think this is boring, but the feel and pace and casting were spot on. I felt heavy emotions as the film was ending.

title: Masterpiece
review: Very very powerful movie making and undeniable super performances by Deniro, Pacino, Pesci, and all the cast. Will become a classic to watch again and again through the ages. Scorsese and Deniro created magic.

title: Phenomenal
review: There are some relational points to my past that this movie burns so close to my memories as a child in rural Romania. Although nothing of the poverty and hardship, tears and emotions ran deep in seeing the displacement for a good and innocent soul like Saroo. Etched in my memory forever, this movie is beyond incredible, as it is not fictional...

title: Brilliant
review: Everything you want in a sci-fi horror movie without lots of actors. This was better than many blockbusters I've seen in recent years.

title: Very good
review: Okay, the acting was spot on, loved the suspense, and special effects. Lacked in believability where communications with earth were disrupted and ending was predictable, though good attempt was made to twist it. Would like a sequel....

title: Masterpiece
review: Brilliant movie making, and very good acting, Delroy was by far the best though, and his character was the most complicated. A 10 in my eyes, except for the extensive use of cursing.
